parameters.text:
=Hi Bri,

I wanted to follow up on our recent message about AI solutions. I know your inbox is probably overflowing, so I'll keep this brief.
Many businesses we work with initially hesitate because they're not sure where AI fits into their current operations. The truth is, the companies seeing the biggest ROI right now aren't the ones with the fanciest tech stacks—they're the ones who started small and scaled strategically.

What we're seeing work in 2025:

- Customer service automation reducing response times by 60%
- Data analysis that used to take days now happens in minutes
- Personalized customer experiences at scale

I'd love to spend 15 minutes learning about your specific challenges and sharing what might be possible for your team.

Would you be open to a quick conversation?

https://calendly.com/pratikbalaji/new-meeting

Best,
Pratik

P.S. No pressure—if the timing isn't right, just let me know when it might work better.

parameters.subject: Hey, Just wondering if your still intrested?

parameters.text:
Hi [Name],

I wanted to follow up on our recent message about AI solutions. I know your inbox is probably overflowing, so I'll keep this brief.
Many businesses we work with initially hesitate because they're not sure where AI fits into their current operations. The truth is, the companies seeing the biggest ROI right now aren't the ones with the fanciest tech stacks—they're the ones who started small and scaled strategically.

What we're seeing work in 2025:

- Customer service automation reducing response times by 60%
- Data analysis that used to take days now happens in minutes
- Personalized customer experiences at scale

I'd love to spend 15 minutes learning about your specific challenges and sharing what might be possible for your team.

Would you be open to a quick conversation?

[CALENDAR LINK PLACEHOLDER]

Best,
[YOUR NAME PLACEHOLDER]

P.S. No pressure—if the timing isn't right, just let me know when it might work better.

messageValues.message:
=I wanted to share a quick win that might resonate with you.

Many teams I talk to feel uncertain about where to start with AI—how complex it will be, whether it’s worth the cost, and if it’ll actually make a measurable difference.

What we’ve seen is that real progress usually starts small: one workflow, one process, one measurable result. Once that’s in place, scaling becomes easy—and the ROI tends to follow fast.

If that sounds worth exploring, how about a quick 20-minute chat to discuss what this could look like for your business?

[CALENDAR LINK PLACEHOLDER]

Looking forward to connecting,
[YOUR NAME PLACEHOLDER]

P.S. Happy to send a case study or example before the call if you’d like a preview.

Many businesses we work with initially hesitate because they're not sure where AI fits into their current operations. The truth is, the companies seeing the biggest ROI right now aren't the ones with the fanciest tech stacks—they're the ones who started small and scaled strategically.

messageValues.message:
=
Hi [Name],

I don't want to be that person who keeps flooding your inbox, so this will be my last message unless you'd like to continue the conversation.

I genuinely believe AI could make a meaningful impact on your business, but I also know timing is everything—and that's completely okay.

If you ever want to explore what we could do together, my calendar is always open:

[CALENDAR LINK PLACEHOLDER]

Wishing you all the best,
[YOUR NAME PLACEHOLDER]

P.S. If you'd prefer I check back in a few months when things might be less hectic, just reply with "Later", and I'll make a note to reach out next quarter.
